name: Jota+Connector for Dropbox V2
description: Jota+ Connector for Dropbox is a plugin to connect Jota+ with Dropbox.  Install this plugin then you can activate the connectivity to Dropbox of Jota+.  This app only connect to Dropbox server.  Jota+ Connector for Dropbox includes Dropbox SDK for Android. ---------------------------- This app needs Jota+ and Jota+PRO-KEY.  ---------------------------- How to use connector. - Start Jota+. - Touch Open on the toolbar then file browser will open. - Click Hamburger icon on the top-left corner then click Settings-Storage. - Select one which you want and install a connector. - Log in to the connector. - Again open the drawer. - Click the name of the connector. - Browse directory on the file system. - Open a file.  You shouldnt use Official Dropbox App to use this app.
